code:
items = [(1, 4), (2, 3), (3, 5), (4, 6)]
capacity = 10

items.sort(key=lambda x: x[1]/x[0], reverse=True)

profit = 0
for item in items:
    if item[0] <= capacity:
        profit += item[1]
        capacity -= item[0]
    else:
        profit += capacity * (item[1]/item[0])
        break

print(profit)
